description: A rare and powerful form of Haki that allows the user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. Only one in several million people possess this ability. In this episode, Luffy unconsciously uses it while severely poisoned to protect Bentham from Army Wolves.

keyMoments.description: Luffy unconsciously unleashes Conqueror's Haki against the Army Wolves on Level 5, knocking them all out despite being severely poisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Luffy's willpower is so strong it manifests even when he's barely conscious, foreshadowing his future mastery of this rare ability.

limitations: At this point, Luffy has no conscious control over this ability
Only activates in moments of extreme emotion or desperation

reveals.information: Luffy can use Conqueror's Haki even while unconscious and poisoned
